props.desc: QTable's header column scoped slot property
props.desc_cn: QTable的header column scoped的插槽属性

auto-width.desc: Tries to shrink header column width size; Useful for columns with a checkbox/radio/toggle
auto-width.desc_cn: 尝试缩小标题列宽大小；对于带有复选框/单选框/切换组件的列很有用

default.desc: Default slot in the devland unslotted content of the component
default.desc_cn: 组件的devland unslotted内容中的默认插槽
